name: Knight's Path (MisterCheng)
description:
Knight's Path is a student project of a fantasy platformer more focused on level design. Please think about the game more as a level showcase. Most assets were self-created but a fair amount of used assets come from the unreal marketplace. Animation and the Character in the game come from Mixamo.

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Camera movement

Space:  Jump /double jump

E: interact with buttons

M: Open-level selector

ESC: Pause

Used assets:

"Cartoon Water Shader" by Sandvector Studios

"Stylized Asian Village" by AleksandrIvanov

Used music;

"In Dreamland" by Chillpeach

"River Dance"  by Keys of Moon Music

"Dancers in the Fire" by Jonny Easton

"Adventure" by Alexander Nakarada
